adjust: Create a new webentity for this url
confirm-forget-server: Are you sure you want to forget this server ?
browse-create: Create a new entity distinct from the current one ...
do-not-show-again: Do not show me this message again
error.corpus-not-created-no-resource: Corpus not created. Hyphe's server is overloaded, please retry later.
error.corpus-not-started-no-resource: Corpus not started. Hyphe's server is overloaded, please retry later.
error.corpus-not-started-starting: Corpus not started. Starting corpus now…
error.existing-prefix: Warning: this prefix is already bound to another webentity (see Context)
error.loading-server: This server seems unavailable: {message}, please select another one
error.url-and-name-required: URL and name fields are required
name: Name
set-homepage: Set this webpage as the homepage of the webentity
sidebar.contextual.referrers-help: Webentities containing pages which point to this webentity pages
sidebar.contextual.referrals-help: Webentities containing pages pointed by this webentity pages
sidebar.cartel.webentity-status-help: Decide whether the currently browsed webentity should be included in your corpus, excluded, or put aside as 'undecided' for further inquiry
sidebar.cartel.webentity-status-help.IN: include this webentity in the corpus and move it to the IN list
sidebar.cartel.webentity-status-help.UND: move this webentity to the UNDECIDED list
sidebar.cartel.webentity-status-help.OUT: exclude this webentity and move it to the OUT list
sidebar.cartel.webentity-name-help: Edit the name of the currently browsed webentity. It will be displayed in lists and visualizations
sidebar.cartel.known-webpages-help: Review known pages belonging to the currently browsed webentity
sidebar.cartel.linked-webentities-help: Review webentities citing or cited by the currently browsed webentity
sidebar.cartel.tags-help: Annotate the currently browsed webentity with categorized tags (this will be useful to group and visualize webentities)
sidebar.cartel.field-notes-help: Write free comments and remarks about the currently browsed webentity
stack-status.help.DISCOVERED: webentities discovered through browsing or by analyzing webentities that you included in the corpus
stack-status.help.IN: webentities relevant to the inquiry, that you included in the corpus
stack-status.help.OUT: webentities irrelevant to the inquiry, that you excluded from the corpus
stack-status.help.UNDECIDED: webentities that you have put aside for further decision to put them in or out of the corpus
webentity-info-crawl-started-notificatio: Crawling this webentity has been programmed
webentity-info-crawl-canceled-notificati: Crawling this webentity has been canceled
webentity-info-merge-successful-notifica: The two webentities were successfully merged
webentity-crawl-popup-message: WARNING: Setting this webentity's status as "IN" will start crawling it. Please check before that its perimeter defined in blue above suits you.
webentity-crawl-popup-message-2: Otherwise, cancel and click on "+" to define a new webentity, then set it as "IN".
webentity-crawl-popup-message-3: Also remember to adjust the name and the Homepage of the webentity if necessary!
webentity-merge-popup-message-redirect: WARNING: The webentity "{old}" which you tried to access automatically redirected you to a webpage that belongs to another webentity "{new}".
webentity-merge-popup-message-manual: WARNING: Do you want to merge "{old}" to another webentity "{new}".
webentity-merge-popup-message-2: You can either merge these two webentities together, or ignore this message.
webentity-merge-popup-message-3: If you don't merge the webentities, you won't be able to edit the status, name or tags or the intended webentity from Hyphe-Browser, you should instead use Hyphe's special tab and look for the webentity to edit it from within Hyphe's classical web interface.
